A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I absolutely loved this movie! In Episode VIII\, there was a deeper look into the dark side\, and yet there are strong overtones of hope. There was lots of classic Star Wars action\, with bits of salty-sweet humor (a la Han who we miss) sprinkled in throughout for a wonderful blend of nostalgia & new fun. All in all\, a truly great addition to the series\, and I am excited to see where some of the foreshadowing breadcrumbs will take us next.
